src.nn.pp module¶

Implmentation of different pyramidal pooling layers

  • SPP: spatial pyramidal pooling (vertical and horizontal bins)

  • TPP: temporal pyramidal pooling (horizontal bins only)

I took some inspiration from a pre-existing implementation of the PHOCNet.


class src.nn.pp.GPP(gpp_type=<PPTypes.T_TPP: 3>, levels=3, pool_type=<PPTypePooling.MAX_POOL: 4>, n_f_maps=512)[source]¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Generic class for SPP and TPP layers
